text: @Mike_Pence @VP @realDonaldTrump Does anyone actually believe your BS? "fought tirelessly to protect the most vulnerable"? - FFS he just lost a Supreme Court decision that proves the opposite. "Our whole-of-America" response to Covid19 - what exactly would that be because from here it looks like nothing.#moron
